mapper.select: select category_no AS categoryNo, category_name AS categoryName from board_data_category
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_data ( license_kindergarten, teacher_no, category_no, data_original_name, data_storage_name, data_url, data_size, data_day ) VALUES ( #{licenseKindergarten}, #{teacherNo}, #{categoryNo}, #{dataOriginalName}, #{dataStorageName}, #{dataUrl}, #{dataSize}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') );
mapper.select: select data_no AS dataNo from board_data where data_storage_name = #{dataStorageName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( license_kindergarten, board_title, board_category_no, data_no, board_day, teacher_no, board_content ) VALUES ( #{licenseKindergarten}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardCategoryNo}, #{dataNo}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d'), #{teacherNo}, #{boardContent} );
mapper.select: select count(*) from board where board_category_no = #{categoryNo}

select license_kindergarten AS licenseKindergarten, board_no AS boardNo, board_title AS boardTitle, board_category_no AS boardCategoryNo, data_no AS dataNo, board_day AS boardDay, teacher_no AS teacherNo, board_content AS boardContent from board where license_kindergarten = #{license} and board_category_no = #{categoryNo} order by board_no desc limit #{nowPage},#{getCount}
